thread.title: Eric Bolling Sends Message To GOP Establishment, “Let The President Lead”
thread.title_full: Eric Bolling Sends Message To GOP Establishment, “Let The President Lead”

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: Eric Bolling Sends Message To GOP Establishment, “Let The President Lead”
text:
Trump Budget is the Beginning of the End for THE SWAMP 
“They fight him, they make ridiculous demands, they put up political roadblocks,” he continued. “And no, I’m not talking about the Democrats or the liberal mainstream media. I’m talking about the establishment Republicans . 
“The #NeverTrumpers, the old-school Republicans who tried to derail the Trump train for a year are still at it.” The biggest culprits, Bolling said, were “John Lindsey McCain Graham,” making a portmanteau out of two of the most conspicuously liberal Republicans in the Senate caucus. 
“Who are these two has-been senators to demand the president do anything for them?” Bolling said.   
According to USA Today and CNN , both Graham and McCain have demanded evidence from Trump on his wiretapping claims , one of a number of times they’ve clashed with the president. Both have arguably been Trump’s biggest enemies on the right. 
Bolling said that the two should “get on board (the Trump Train) or get out of the way.” 
“The Trump train is an express to prosperity, no stops in RINO-Land planned,” he added. 
Bolling also went after Paul Ryan, whose Obamacare replacement plan he called a “fat flop” which would sink Trump’s 2020 re-election campaign.
